full_summary:
===================================

**Call for Proposals - Two Communications Consultants**
--------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** cb-7159-80486594

**Published Date:** July 12, 2023

**Closes:** August 4, 2023 at 14:00:00

**Contract Period:** One (1) year, with four (4) one-year, irrevocable options

**About the Contract:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to engage two (2) Communication Consultants to provide professional services under the Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA).

**Responsibilities:**

* Provide communication services to support the RCMP's strategic objectives
* Develop and implement strategic communication plans
* Enhance the RCMP's reputation and image through effective communication

**Eligibility:**

* Firms must have a minimum of three (3) years of experience in providing communication services
* Firms must demonstrate experience in working with government agencies
* Firms must have a valid business registration and a good credit record

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical merit (40%)
* Price (30%)
* Demonstrated experience and qualifications (30%)

**Contract Location:**

* National Capital Region (NCR)

**Payment Terms:**

* Payments will be made pursuant to the terms and conditions outlined in the contract

**How to Respond:**

* Responses must be submitted electronically in PDF format
* Responses must be submitted by the closing date and time

**Supporting Documents:**

* The call for proposals (this document)
* The Terms and Conditions

**Contact Information:**

* Adam Harrington, Contracting Officer
* Phone: (343) 574-7221
* Email: [adam.harrington@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.harrington@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

**Website:**

* [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) (secure login required)
